summary: Item 2. MANAGEMENT’S DISCUSSION AND ANALYSIS ​ ​ OF FINANCIAL CONDITION AND RESULTS OF OPERATIONS ​ ​ ​ ​ ​ (amounts in millions, except share and per share data, unless otherwise noted) ​ ​ The following discussion and analysis of the financial condition and results of operations for the three and nine months ended September 30, 2025 and 2024 has been derived from and should be read in conjunction with our unaudited Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements and the accompanying notes thereto included in Part I, Item 1 herein for Amphenol Corporation (together with its subsidiaries, “Amphenol,” the “Company,” “we,” “our” or “us”). The following discussion and analysis should also be read in conjunction with the consolidated financial statements and notes included in the Company’s Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2024 (the “2024 Annual Report”). The Condensed Consolidated Financial Statements have been prepared in U.S. dollars, in accordance with accounting principles generally accepted in the United States of America (“U.S.
